AT.name: CRIMSON SHROUD™
AT.description: LEVEL-5 und Yasumi Matsuno haben die kreativsten Köpfe der Branche in der Welt der Rollenspiele zusammengebracht, um sich der Herausforderung von CRIMSON SHROUD zu stellen. Als Tribut an die RPG-Brettspiele hängen kritische Entscheidungen vom Rollen eines Würfels ab. Spieler rollen in Echtzeit Würfel und verknüpfen ihre Fertigkeiten, um Bonuswürfel mit immer höherem Nennwert zu verdienen. Nutze jedoch deine Würfel strategisch klug, sonst werden deine Gegner siegen! Folge der Geschichte eines jungen „Chaser" namens Glauque und lasse dich mit ihm und seinem Team in das Geheimnis des Originären Geschenks, des Crimson Shroud, hineinziehen. Ein neues verwegenes Abenteuer erwartet dich!

AU.name: CRIMSON SHROUD™
AU.description: LEVEL-5 and Yasumi Matsuno have brought together the industry's most venerated creators in the world of RPGs to take up the challenge and lend their support to the production of CRIMSON SHROUD. A tribute to the table-top RPG, crucial decisions hinge on the roll of a die. Players roll dice in real time and chain skills together to earn bonus dice of greater and greater face value. Use your dice strategically though, or your foes may yet get the best of you! Follow the tale of a young "Chaser" named Giauque, as he and his team find themselves drawn into the mystery of the Original Gift, the Crimson Shroud. A bold new adventure awaits!

BG.name: CRIMSON SHROUD™
BG.description: LEVEL-5 and Yasumi Matsuno have brought together the industry's most venerated creators in the world of RPGs to take up the challenge and lend their support to the production of CRIMSON SHROUD. A tribute to the table-top RPG, crucial decisions hinge on the roll of a die. Players roll dice in real time and chain skills together to earn bonus dice of greater and greater face value. Use your dice strategically though, or your foes may yet get the best of you! Follow the tale of a young "Chaser" named Giauque, as he and his team find themselves drawn into the mystery of the Original Gift, the Crimson Shroud. A bold new adventure awaits!

BE.name: CRIMSON SHROUD™
BE.description: LEVEL-5 et Yasumi Matsuno ont rassemblé les plus illustres créateurs de jeux de rôle au niveau mondial pour relever le défi et apporter leur soutien à la production de CRIMSON SHROUD. En hommage aux JDR de plateau, toute décision cruciale repose sur un lancé de dés. Les joueurs lancent les dés en temps réel et les compétences s'additionnent pour gagner des dés de bonus de plus en plus élevés. Mais attention à utiliser vos dés avec stratégie, ou vos ennemis pourraient encore prendre le dessus ! Suivez les aventures de Giauque, un jeune « Pisteur », qui se retrouve lui et son équipe entraînés dans le mystère originel du Crimson Shroud. Une incroyable nouvelle aventure vous attend !

ES.name: CRIMSON SHROUD™
ES.description: LEVEL-5 y Yasumi Matsuno han reunido a los creadores de juegos de rol más venerados de la industria para afrontar el desafío y ayudar en la producción de CRIMSOM SHROUD. En un tributo a los juegos de rol de mesa, las decisiones importantes dependen de un tiro de dados. Los jugadores tiran los dados en tiempo real y unen sus habilidades para ganar bonus con dados de mayor valor. Usa tus dados de forma estratégica, sino tus enemigos se quedarán con lo mejor de ti. Sigue la historia de un joven "cazador" llamado Giauque, cuando él y su equipo se ven involucrados en el misterio del Obsequio original, el Crimson Shroud. ¡Una intrépida y nueva aventura te espera!

Follow the tale of a young "Chaser" named Giauque, as he and his team find themselves drawn into the mystery of the Original Gift, the Crimson Shroud. A bold new adventure awaits!

IT.name: CRIMSON SHROUD™
IT.description: LEVEL-5 e Yasumi Matsuno hanno riunito i più famosi creatori di GDR del settore per affrontare una nuova sfida: la creazione di CRIMSON SHROUD. Proprio come nei classici GDR da tavolo, le decisioni più importanti dipendono dal tiro di un dado. I giocatori tirano i dadi in tempo reale, concatenando le loro abilità al fine di ottenere dadi bonus di valore sempre maggiore. Ricorda però di utilizzare i tuoi dadi in maniera strategica o i tuoi nemici avranno la meglio su di te! Segui la storia di Giauque, un giovane "Cacciatore" che si troverà coinvolto insieme ai suoi compagni nel mistero del Dono originale, il "Crimson Shroud". Una spericolata avventura ti attende!

A tribute to the table-top RPG, crucial decisions hinge on the roll of a die. Players roll dice in real time and chain skills together to earn bonus dice of greater and greater face value. Use your dice strategically though, or your foes may yet get the best of you! Follow the tale of a young "Chaser" named Giauque, as he and his team find themselves drawn into the mystery of the Original Gift, the Crimson Shroud. A bold new adventure awaits!

NL.name: CRIMSON SHROUD™
NL.description: LEVEL-5 en Yasumi Matsuno hebben de meest vereerde ontwerpers uit de RPG-wereld bij elkaar gebracht om bij te dragen aan de productie van CRIMSON SHROUD. CRIMSON SHROUD is een eerbetoon aan bordspel RPG's, waarin cruciale beslissingen afhangen van een dobbelsteenworp! Spelers gooien dobbelstenen in real-time en linken vaardigheden aan elkaar om bonusstenen te verdienen van almaar grotere werpwaarden. Gebruik je teerlingen strategisch, of je tegenstanders zullen je onder de tafel krijgen! Volg het verhaal van een jonge "Chaser" genaamd Giauque, terwijl hij en zijn team het mysterie van de Original Gift – de Crimson Shroud – ingezogen worden. Een stoutmoedig nieuw avontuur wacht!

NZ.name: CRIMSON SHROUD™
NZ.description: LEVEL-5 and Yasumi Matsuno have brought together the industry's most venerated creators in the world of RPGs to take up the challenge and lend their support to the production of CRIMSON SHROUD. Follow the tale of a young "Chaser" named Giauque, as he and his team find themselves drawn into the mystery of the Original Gift, the Crimson Shroud. A bold new adventure awaits!

RU.name: CRIMSON SHROUD™
RU.description: Ради появления на свет CRIMSON SHROUD компания LEVEL-5 и Ясуми Мацуно собрали вместе известнейших разработчиков ролевых игр. CRIMSON SHROUD создана по мотивам настольной ролевой игры, в которой судьба персонажей целиком зависит от броска кубиков. Игрокам предстоит бросать кости в режиме реального времени и использовать комбинации навыков, чтобы получить бонусные кубики с большим числом очков на гранях. В игре необходимо просчитывать каждый ход, иначе противники воспользуются преимуществом и одержат верх! Сюжет повествует о приключениях молодого «охотника» (Chaser) по имени Giauque и его друзей. Загадка Изначального дара (Original Gift) — легендарной Алой мантии (Crimson Shroud) — станет для героев началом захватывающего путешествия!
